job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Sr. Generative AI Engineer at Reavant, you will directly contribute to building a Co-Pilot for commercial real estate (CRE) professionals. Reavant's AI Agents can help real estate professionals create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents such as contracts as well as act autonomously to perform otherwise manually time-consuming tasks.

   You'll tackle a mix of research (20%), design (20%), and engineering (60%) challenges to drive our product and service to the next level. Working closely with our hands-on CTO, you will create or adapt functionality with the right balance of quality, performance, speed, and usability.

   As our first technical hire, you will have a significant and visible impact on our product, service, and company., Activities where you will make a difference include:
     * Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other).
     * Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget.
     * Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow.
     * Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base.
     * (Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself.
     * Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary.
     * Follow the newest technologies and smartly pick the most promising and relevant ones.

   At this stage, shipping imperfect functionality and learning from its usage by customers is more important than producing perfection. We maximally rely on external services for non-core elements, so we can focus on what really matters.
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI/NLP Engineer (Senior)

As a Sr. Generative AI Engineer at Reavant, you will directly contribute to building a Co-Pilot for commercial real estate (CRE) professionals. Reavant's AI Agents can help real estate professionals create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents such as contracts as well as act autonomously to perform otherwise manually time-consuming tasks.

   You'll tackle a mix of research (20%), design (20%), and engineering (60%) challenges to drive our product and service to the next level. Working closely with our hands-on CTO, you will create or adapt functionality with the right balance of quality, performance, speed, and usability.

   As our first technical hire, you will have a significant and visible impact on our product, service, and company., Activities where you will make a difference include:
     * Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other).
     * Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget.
     * Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow.
     * Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base.
     * (Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself.
     * Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary.
     * Follow the newest technologies and smartly pick the most promising and relevant ones.

   At this stage, shipping imperfect functionality and learning from its usage by customers is more important than producing perfection. We maximally rely on external services for non-core elements, so we can focus on what really matters.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications and agents powered by Generative AI and NLP, including creating user workflows, interactions, and productizing experimental subprocesses into a SaaS codebase. The core responsibilities align with designing, developing, and deploying generative AI solutions, which is the primary focus of a GenAI Engineer. While there's mention of ML tasks and MLOps, the context points towards applying these within the generative AI domain for user-facing products.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other)' directly relates to the core process of creating, training, and evaluating models, with a specific emphasis on Generative AI and NLP.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other)

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget' clearly indicates the development of user-facing software components and interfaces.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow' directly maps to the category of building and managing infrastructure for deploying and maintaining models.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base' describes the process of taking research outputs and integrating them into a production software system.
job_tasks.phrase: Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base

job_tasks.justification: The phrase '(Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself' implies significant software engineering effort in improving and restructuring existing systems.
job_tasks.phrase: (Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary' are fundamental practices in software development for ensuring code quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents' implies processing and understanding data from documents, which falls under data engineering tasks, especially in the context of NLP.
job_tasks.phrase: create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'AI Agents' and 'Generative AI' directly points to the use and development of generative models and agentic systems.
The mention of 'classic NLP' indicates work with traditional natural language processing models.
